amendment.description: To provide for interoperable communications systems planning in connection with the 2010 Olympics.

vote.text: Amendment SA 4636 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.

action.text: Amendment SA 4636 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Cantwell. (consideration: CR S7475-7478; text: CR S7476) To provide for interoperable communications systems planning in connection with the 2010 Olympics.
Senate amendment agreed to: Amendment SA 4636 agreed to in Senate by Unanimous Consent.
Senate amendment proposed (on the floor): Amendment SA 4636 proposed by Senator Gregg for Senator Cantwell.
